text: Hi Tom so I watched the videos and I can see what you are trying to do. In terms of the rig I'm not the best person to give you feedback on the ins and outs of rigging but for your animation I think keeping it basic like you are is a good idea. A character like Mike from Monsters Inc. is a great example of what you can do with a simple design. Not saying that would have been easy to rig or animate but the design is simple.
I think from the rigging videos though you should look to improve the deformations in your rig, so mouth shapes (especially the corners) and the elbows/shoulders.
that will really help you hit some of the animated shapes you are looking for
